title: Motley Fool Money: 06.26.2009
description: The Fed says the economy should improve but Warren Buffett says the economy “needs more medicine.” Durable goods orders rise, consumer confidence climbs, and the savings rate hits a 15-year high. So what does it all mean for investors? In this installment of Motley Fool Money, we tackle that question, talk about Apple’s less-than-full-disclosure policy, and share a few stock ideas.
